p.s: In this excerpt of the novel The Hate U Give written by Angie Thomas, the main character Starr finds herself at a protest against police brutality and for justice for the murder of Khalil, a black teenager that was shot by a police officer.
She came there to participate in the protests after the police officer that shot Khalil was declared not guilty.
After meeting her attorney Ms. Ofrah at the protest Starr decides to use her voice as a weapon and to speak up for justice.
She gets a bullhorn and starts delivering a speech to the crowd of protesters and police officerofficers that are present at this event.
